title: Bad Religion Discography (1982-2013)
description:
Only Entertainment?
Bad Religion Discography (1982-2013) FLAC
Quality: 16bit/44kHz-48kHz FLAC

"And I want to conquer the world, give all the idiots a brand new religion"


Includes all offical albums:
1982 How Could Hell Be Any Worse
1983 Into the Unknown
1988 Suffer
1989 No Control
1990 Against the Grain
1992 Generator
1993 Recipe for Hate
1994 Stranger Than Fiction
1996 The Gray Race
1998 No Substance 
2000 The New America
2002 The Process of Belief
2004 The Empire Strikes First 
2007 New Maps of Hell
2010 The Dissent of Man
2013 True North

And two compilations:
1995 All Ages (Compilation)
1997 Tested (Live)


"If I can touch it, I can destroy it, if it's imaginable to some degree, I can become it"

I'd like to thank the following uploaders:
baconryan77 - Provided the backbone.
politux - Only FLAC of Into the Unknown I could find on the net, albeit in ridiculous quality
insinuendo - Took Against the Grain from your crop :)
politux again - Thanks for the Suffer and All Ages torrents, toned it down to 16bit/48kHz though
formen - Special thanks for the bonus tracks on New Maps of Hell
Kitlope - For the Dissent of Man
qculfj - For the latest album, True North and finally
Someotherdude - For the B-sides, Rarities, Cover songs and KROQ Christmas Show ^^


"I'm a member of a growing populace, we enforce our popularity"
